text: PRIMIO Epidi i anagnorisi tis axioprepias pou inai simphiti se ola ta meli tis anthropinis ikoyenias kathos kai ton ison kai anapallotrioton dikaiomaton tous apoteli to themelio tis eleftherias tis dikaiosinis kai tis irinis ston kosmo Epidi i paragnorisi kai i periphronisi ton dikaiomaton tou anthropou odiyisan se praxis varvarotitas pou exeyiroun tin anthropini sinidisi kai i prooptiki enos kosmou opou i anthropi tha inai eleftheri na miloun kai na pistevoun litromeni apo ton tromo kai tin athliotita ekhi diakirikhthi os i pio ipsili epidioxi tou anthropou Epidi ekhi ousiastiki simasia na prostatevontai ta anthropina dikaiomata apo ena kathestos dikaiou oste o anthropos na min anangazetai na prosphevyi os eskhato kataphiyio stin exeyersi kata tis tirannias kai tis katapiesis Epidi ekhi ousiastiki simasia na entharrinetai i anaptixi philikon skheseon anamesa sta ethni Epidi me ton katastatiko Kharti i lai ton Inomenon Ethnon diakirixan kai pali tin pisti tous sta themeliaka dikaiomata tou anthropou stin axioprepia kai tin axia tis anthropinis prosopikotitas stin isotita dikaiomaton andron kai yinaikon kai diakirixan pos inai apophasismeni na sintelesoun stin kinoniki proodo kai na dimiouryisoun kaliteres sinthikes zis sta plaisia mias evriteris eleftherias Epidi ta krati meli anelavan tin ipokhreosi na exasphalisoun se sinergasia me ton Organismo ton Inomenon Ethnon ton apotelesmatiko sevasmo ton dikaiomaton tou anthropou kai ton themeliakon eleftherion se olo ton kosmo Epidi i taftotita antilipseon os pros ta dikaiomata kai tis eleftheries aftes ekhi exairetiki simasia yia na ekplirothi pera os pera afti i ipokhreosi I YENIKI SINELISI Diakirissi oti i parousa Ikoumeniki Diakirixi ton Dikaiomaton tou Anthropou apoteli to kino idaniko sto opio prepi na katatinoun oli i lai kai ola ta ethni etsi oste kathe atomo kai kathe organo tis kinonias me ti Diakirixi afti diarkos sti skepsi na katavalli me ti didaskalia kai tin paidia kathe prospathia yia na anaptikhthi o sevasmos ton dikaiomaton kai ton eleftherion afton kai na exasphalisti proodeftika me esoterika kai diethni mesa i pangosmia kai apotelesmatiki epharmoyi tous toso anamesa stous laous ton idion ton kraton melon oso kai anamesa stous plithismous khoron pou vriskontai sti dikaiodosia tous ARTHRO Oli i anthropi yenniountai eleftheri kai isi stin axioprepia kai ta dikaiomata Inai prikismeni me loyiki kai sinidisi kai ophiloun na simperipherontai metaxi tous me pnevma adelphosinis ARTHRO Kathe anthropos dikaioutai na epikalitai ola ta dikaiomata kai oles tis eleftheries pou prokirissi i parousa Diakirixi khoris kamia apolitos diakrisi idikotera os pros ti phili to khroma to philo ti glossa tis thriskies tis politikes i opiesdipote alles pepithisis tin ethniki i kinoniki katagoyi tin periousia ti yennisi i opiadipote alli katastasi Den tha bori akoma na yinetai kamia diakrisi exaitias tou politikou nomikou i diethnous kathestotos tis khoras apo tin opia proerkhetai kanis ite prokitai yia khora i edaphiki periokhi anexartiti ipo kidemonia i ipexousia i pou vrisketai ipo opiondipote allon periorismo kiriarkhias ARTHRO Kathe atomo ekhi dikaioma sti zi tin eleftheria kai tin prosopiki tou asphalia ARTHRO Kanis den epitrepetai na zi ipo kathestos doulias olikis i merikis I doulia kai to doulemporio ipo opiadipote morphi apagorevontai ARTHRO Kanis den epitrepetai na ipovalletai se vasanistiria oute se pini i metakhirisi skliri apanthropi i tapinotiki ARTHRO Kathenas opou kai an vrisketai ekhi dikaioma stin anagnorisi tis nomikis tou prosopikotitas ARTHRO Oli inai isi apenanti ston nomo kai ekhoun dikaioma se isi prostasia tou nomou khoris kamia apolitos diakrisi Oli ekhoun dikaioma se isi prostasia apo kathe diakrisi pou tha paraviaze tin parousa Diakirixi kai apo kathe proklisi yia mia tetia dismeni diakrisi ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi dikaioma na aski apotelesmatika endika mesa sta armodia ethnika dikastiria kata ton praxeon pou paraviazoun ta themeliaka dikaiomata ta opia tou anagnorizoun to Sintagma kai o nomos ARTHRO Kanis den bori na sillamvanetai na kratitai i na exorizetai afthaireta ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi dikaioma me pliri isotita na ekdikazetai i ipothesi tou dikaia kai dimosia apo dikastirio anexartito kai amerolipto pou tha apophasisi ite yia ta dikaiomata kai tis ipokhreosis tou ite se periptosi pinikis diadikasias yia to vasimo tis katigorias pou strephetai enantion tou ARTHRO Kathe katigoroumenos yia piniko adikima prepi na theoritai athoos osotou diapistothi i enokhi tou simphona me ton nomo se piniki diki kata tin opia tha tou ekhoun exasphalisti oles i aparaitites yia tin iperaspisi tou engiisis Kanis den tha katadikazetai yia praxis i paralipsis pou kata ton khrono pou telestikan den sinistousan axiopino adikima kata to esoteriko i to diethnes dikaio Episis den epivalletai pini variteri apo ekini pou iskhie kata ton khrono pou telestike i axiopini praxi ARTHRO Kanis den epitrepetai na iposti afthairetes epemvasis stin idiotiki tou zi tin ikoyenia tin katikia i tin allilographia tou oute prosvoles tis timis kai tis ipolipsis tou Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na ton prostatevoun i nomi apo epemvasis kai prosvoles aftou tou idous ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na kiklophori elefthera kai na ekleyi ton topo tis diamonis tou sto esoteriko enos kratous Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na engatalipi opiadipote khora akoma kai ti diki tou kai na epistrephi se aftin ARTHRO Kathe atomo pou katadioketai ekhi to dikaioma na zita asilo kai tou parekhetai asilo se alles khores To dikaioma afto den bori kanis na to epikalesti se periptosi dioxis yia pragmatiko adikima tou kinou pinikou dikaiou i yia eneryies antithetes pros tous skopous kai tis arkhes tou IE ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma mias ithayenias Kanis den bori na sterithi afthaireta tin ithayenia tou oute to dikaioma na allaxi ithayenia ARTHRO Apo ti stigmi pou tha phthasoun se ilikia gamou o andras kai i yinaika khoris kanena periorismo exaitias tis philis tis ethnikotitas i tis thriskias ekhoun to dikaioma na pantrevontai kai na idrioun ikoyenia Kai i dio ekhoun isa dikaiomata os pros ton gamo kata ti diarkia tou gamou kai kata ti dialisi tou Gamos den bori na sinaphthi para mono me eleftheri kai pliri sinainesi ton mellonimphon I ikoyenia inai to phisiko kai to vasiko stikhio tis kinonias kai ekhi to dikaioma prostasias apo tin kinonia kai to kratos ARTHRO Kathe atomo mono tou i me allous mazi ekhi to dikaioma tis idioktisias Kanis den bori na sterithi afthaireta tin idioktisia tou ARTHRO Kathe atomo ekhi to dikaioma tis eleftherias tis skepsis tis sinidisis kai tis thriskias Sto dikaioma afto perilamvanetai i eleftheria yia tin allayi tis thriskias i pepithiseon opos kai i eleftheria na ekdiloni kanis ti thriskia tou i tis thriskeftikes tou pepithisis monos i mazi me allous dimosia i idiotika me ti didaskalia tin askisi ti latria kai me tin telesi thriskeftikon teleton ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma tis eleftherias tis gnomis kai tis ekphrasis pou simaini to dikaioma na min iphistatai dismenis sinepies yia tis gnomes tou kai to dikaioma na anaziti na pairni kai na diadidi plirophories kai idees me opiodipote meso ekphrasis kai apo olo ton kosmo ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na sinerkhetai kai na sinetairizetai elefthera kai yia irinikous skopous Kanis den bori na ipokhreothi na simmetekhi se orismeno somatio ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na simmetekhi sti diakivernisi tis khoras tou amesa i emmesa me antiprosopous elefthera eklegmenous Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na yinetai dektos ipo isous orous stis dimosies ipiresies tis khoras tou I laki thelisi inai to themelio tis kratikis exousias I thelisi afti prepi na ekphrazetai me timies ekloyes i opies prepi na diexagontai periodika me katholiki isi kai mistiki psiphophoria i me antistikhi diadikasia pou na exasphalizi tin eleftheria tis ekloyis ARTHRO Kathe atomo os melos tou kinonikou sinolou ekhi dikaioma kinonikis prostasias I kinonia me tin ethniki protovoulia kai ti diethni sinergasia analoga panta me tin organosi kai tis ikonomikes dinatotites kathe kratous ekhi khreos na tou exasphalisi tin ikanopiisi ton ikonomikon kinonikon kai politistikon dikaiomaton pou inai aparaitita yia tin axioprepia kai tin eleftheri anaptixi tis prosopikotitas tou ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na ergazetai kai na epileyi elefthera to epangelma tou na ekhi dikaies kai ikanopiitikes sinthikes doulias kai na prostatevetai apo tin aneryia Oli khoris kamia diakrisi ekhoun to dikaioma isis amivis yia isi ergasia Kathe ergazomenos ekhi dikaioma dikaiis kai ikanopiitikis amivis pou na exasphalizi se afton kai tin ikoyenia tou sinthikes zis axies stin anthropini axioprepia I amivi tis ergasias an iparkhi prepi na simplironetai me alla mesa kinonikis prostasias Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na idrii mazi me allous sindikata kai na simmetekhi se sindikata yia tin proaspisi ton simpheronton tou ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma stin anapafsi se elefthero khrono kai idiaitera se loyiko periorismo tou khronou ergasias kai se periodikes adies me pliris apodokhes ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi dikaioma se ena viotiko epipedo ikano na exasphalisi ston idio kai stin ikoyenia tou iyia kai evimeria kai idikotera trophi roukhismo katikia iatriki perithalpsi opos kai tis aparaitites kinonikes ipiresies Ekhi akoma dikaioma se asphalisi yia tin aneryia tin arrostia tin anapiria ti khiria ti yerontiki ilikia opos kai yia oles tis alles periptosis pou steritai ta mesa tis sintirisis tou exaitias peristaseon anexartiton tis thelisis tou I mitrotita kai i paidiki ilikia ekhoun dikaioma idikis merimnas kai perithalpsis Ola ta paidia anexartita an inai nomima i exogama apolamvanoun tin idia kinoniki prostasia ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi dikaioma stin ekpaidefsi I ekpaidefsi prepi na parekhetai dorean toulakhiston sti stikhiodi kai vasiki vathmida tis I stikhiodis ekpaidefsi inai ipokhreotiki I tekhniki kai epangelmatiki ekpaidefsi prepi na exasphalizetai yia olous I prosvasi stin anotati paidia prepi na inai anikti se olous ipo isous orous analoga me tis ikanotites tous I ekpaidefsi prepi na apovlepi stin pliri anaptixi tis anthropinis prosopikotitas kai stin eniskhisi tou sevasmou ton anthropinon dikaiomaton kai ton themeliakon eleftherion Prepi na proayi tin katanosi tin anektikotita kai ti philia anamesa se ola ta ethni kai se oles tis philes kai tis thriskeftikes omades kai na evni tin anaptixi ton drastiriotiton ton Inomenon Ethnon yia ti diatirisi tis irinis I gonis ekhoun kata proteraiotita to dikaioma na epilegoun to idos tis paidias pou tha dothi sta paidia tous ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na simmetekhi elefthera stin pnevmatiki zi tis kinotitas na khairetai tis kales tekhnes kai na metekhi stin epistimoniki proodo kai sta agatha tis Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na prostatevontai ta ithika kai ilika simpheronta tou pou aporreoun apo kathe idous epistimoniki logotekhniki i kallitekhniki paragoyi tou ARTHRO Kathenas ekhi to dikaioma na epikrati mia kinoniki kai diethnis taxi mesa stin opia ta dikaiomata kai i eleftheries pou prokirissi i parousa Diakirixi na boroun na pragmatonontai se oli tous tin ektasi ARTHRO To atomo ekhi kathikonta apenanti stin kinotita mesa sta plaisia tis opias kai mono inai dinati i eleftheri kai olokliromeni anaptixi tis prosopikotitas tou Stin askisi ton dikaiomaton tou kai stin apolafsi ton eleftherion tou kanis den ipokitai para mono stous periorismous pou orizontai apo tous nomous me apoklistiko skopo na exasphalizetai i anagnorisi kai o sevasmos ton dikaiomaton kai ton eleftherion ton allon kai na ikanopiountai i dikaies apaitisis tis ithikis tis dimosias taxis kai tou yenikou kalou se mia dimokratiki kinonia Ta dikaiomata afta kai i eleftheries den boroun se kamia periptosi na askountai antitheta pros tous skopous kai tis arkhes ton Inomenon Ethnon ARTHRO Kamia diataxi tis parousas Diakirixis den bori na erminefthi oti parekhi se ena kratos se mia omada i se ena atomo opiodipote dikaioma na epididetai se eneryies i na ekteli praxis pou apovlepoun stin arnisi ton dikaiomaton kai ton eleftherion pou exangellontai se aftin
